info.name: SportsRightNow
info.description:
# Introduction

What does your API do?

Get info from all sports teams, players and events, and info about a specific team, player or event

# Overview

Provide an easy to navigate website with an intuitive way of keeping track of upcoming events, the teams participating, and the players as well.

request.description:
**Get Players**

Without parameters, gets all players. Parameters can be passed for page number and items per page when pagination is required.

Returns info on each player.

response.name: https://api.sportsrightnow.me/players

request.description:
**Get Events**

Without parameters, gets all events. Parameters can be passed for page number and items per page when pagination is required.

Returns info on events.

request.description:
**Get Player By ID**

Get info on the specified player. The number after the final slash is the ID of the player you are requesting.

Returns info on that player, their team, and any events they are involved in.

response.name: https://api.sportsrightnow.me/players?1=
response.body:

request.description:
**Get Team By ID**

Get info on the specified team. The number after the final slash is the ID of the team you are requesting.

Returns info on the requested team, its player roster, and any involved events.

response.name: https://api.sportsrightnow.me/teams?id=

request.description:
**Get Event By ID**

Get info on the specified event. The number after the final slash is the ID of the event you are requesting.

Returns info on the event, both the home and away teams, as well as the player rosters of both involved teams.

response.name: https://api.sportsrightnow.me/events?id=
